com.xhive.core.interfaces
Interface XhiveNamedItemIf

All Known Subinterfaces:
XhiveCCIndexIf, XhiveIndexIf
public interface XhiveNamedItemIf

An XhiveNamedItem is an object that has the following properties:

  • Name
  • Description
  • Creation date
  • Modification date
Named items are owned by a user. Only the owner of a named item, or the administrator, can make changes to the named item. When other users try to make a change, an exception is thrown.

(c) X-Hive Corporation B.V. (www.x-hive.com)

Since:
X-Hive/DB 1.1

setName

void setName(java.lang.String name)
Set the name of this item. When the item has a context (that is, it is owned by a list), the name should be unique within that context, otherwise an exception is thrown.

Throws:
XhiveException.NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS - when the name is not unique within the context of this item.
Since:
X-Hive/DB 1.1
